fields.users: Mali Red Cross staff and volunteers

tooltips.itemsdistributed: Choose the kind of distributed item. You can choose more than one item. Mandatory field.
tooltips.activityStartDate: The start date of the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.activityEndDate: Choose the end date of the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.sector: Select the sector under which the activities fall. If a sector is not available in the list, a custom sector can be written and added to the list.
tooltips.program: Select the program that finances the activities. Mandatory field.
tooltips.name: Name the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.status: The current status of the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.typeOfActivity: Select the type of activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.branchs: The branch(es) implementing the activity. Mandatory field.
tooltips.numberOfStaffInvolved: The number of Mali Red Cross staff implementing the activity.
tooltips.numberOfVolunteersInvolved: The number of Mali Red Cross volunteers implementing the activity.
tooltips.numberOfPNSStaffInvolved: The number of staff from partner National Societies supporting the implementation of the activity.
tooltips.regions: La ou les régions dans lesquelles l'activité est mise en œuvre.
tooltips.cercles: Le(s) cercle(s) dans le(s)quel(s) l'activité est mise en œuvre.
tooltips.communes: La (les) commune(s) dans laquelle (lesquelles) l'activité est mise en œuvre. Vous pouvez sélectionner plusieurs communes.
tooltips.assignedUser: The Mali Red Cross staff member responsible for the activity. Staff member must be an existing user in the system. Mandatory field.
tooltips.teams: The team(s) executing the activity. Can be more than one team. Mandatory field.
tooltips.flood: Search the database and select the flood event for which this activity is implemented.
tooltips.epidemics: Search the database and select the epidemics event for which this activity is implemented.
tooltips.drought: Search the database and select the flood event for which this activity is implemented.
tooltips.reasonForCancellation: Enter the reason for the cancellation of this activity. Field mandatory only if status of activity = cancelled.
tooltips.users: The staff and volunteers of the Mali Red Cross involved in this project or program.
